TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgressEventArgs extends System.Management.ManagementEventArgs

Docs.summary: Holds event data for the event.
Gets the current amount of work done by the operation. This is always less than or equal to .
Docs.value: Returns an value representing the current amount of work already completed by the operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value An integer representing the current amount of work already completed by the operation.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets optional additional information regarding the operation's progress.
Docs.value: Returns a value containing information regarding the operation's progress.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value A string containing additional information regarding the operation's progress.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the total amount of work required to be done by the operation.
Docs.value: Returns an value representing the total amount of work to be done by the operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value An integer representing the total amount of work for the operation.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
